body.bibl: Varela Expósito, Alexandre. “Mār-Awgēn and Mār-Bassus-and-Mārt-Šušān, Two Syriac Monasteries in South-East Turkey: A Comparative Study.” In Byzantine, Medieval Georgian and East Christian Monasteries: Art, Architecture, Literature, edited by Nina Chichinadze, 285–318.
